title: International Covid-19 update | Nearly 2 600 US coronavirus deaths in 24 hours, Wuhan's 'wet markets' struggle, New Zealand considers plan to ease lockdown
description: The United States on Wednesday recorded nearly 2 600 additional deaths from the new coronavirus in 24 hours, a new record and the heaviest daily toll of any country, Johns Hopkins University has said.
content:
